chapter.title: Installing and Starting OpenIDM Services
chapter.para: A short description of the install procedure follows below. For a more detailed description including some sample configurations please consult the install guide. For exact prerequisites like JVM versions please consult the release notes.

section.title: Install OpenIDM
section.para: Installing OpenIDM is as simple as to download the openidm.zip file and unzip the archive. The latest build can be fould here: download page.

section.title: Uninstall OpenIDM
section.para: To uninstall OpenIDM simply remove the extracted folder. Eventually drop the database schema "openidm" if using an external jdbc repository.

section.title: Start and Stop OpenIDM in Interactive Mode
section.para: The simplest way to start OpenIDM is to execute the start.sh script (or the run.bat on windows). This will start OpenIDM in a mode where it will report all out put to the OSGI console.
